name: AKnight (Demo)
description:
Warning: This is Just The Demo of The Full Game!!!

Welcome to AKnight!!

The Story of the Aknight. a Unnamed Knight that wield a mysterious weapon, know as as the Mighty AK-47. This is his Journey of Adventure and Action.

What In The Demo?

- 3 Unique Boss. (Giant Eye, Wicked, and Tomb Spirit)

- 3 Different Theme Arena. (Dungeon, Forest, and Desert)

- 4 Type of Enemy. (Skeleton, Slime, Sorcerer, and Summoner)

- A saving System (Although Very Buggy)

Control:

A : Move Left

D : Move right

Space : Jump

Left Mouse : Shoot
